attributes.title: Isle of Colonsay Brewing Company
attributes.description:
Created on February 28, 2010 by leo on Sourcemap.org:

Started brewing in March 2007, using a five barrel plant.  Three core beers are brewed - Colonsay Lager (4.4 %), Colonsay 80/- Ale (4.2%), and Colonsay IPA (3.9%).  Beers are available in bottles only.

attributes.name: Isle of Colonsay Brewing Company
attributes.1: Colonsay, Argyll and Bute PA61 7, UK
